description:
Unlocks the following items: Durandal 

A weapon wielded by Asura in Tales of Innocence.
BGM Change: ""Break Through With the Sword""

Sword Skin/Tales series DLC. ATK 50, RES 30, LUK 40.
Alters Sword Appearance to "Durandal" and alters battle music.

*This item is included in the Deco Item: "Tales of" Set.
name: Deco Item: Durandal
